description: mounted to ivory paper; standing central figure with his PL hand on the forehead of a thin, seated old man, and his PR hand held in a blessing gesture; dog, LRC; many figures in background, including child at central man's PL elbow and woman with baby at right; column and base at top right of center; squared off with black chalk
markings: Anchor in a circle over letters VA (not in Lugt).
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash on laid paper
provenance: Unknown collection, collector's mark, Anchor in a circle over letters VA (not in Lugt). [Colnaghi, London, until 1989; sold July 19, as Anonymous Italian, for Â£1,250, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1989-d. 2010; bequeathed to Mia).
title: Saint Lawrence Restoring the Sight of Lucillus
